keywords: ['bluegrass', 'male voice', 'announcement', 'no percussion', 'no vocal melody', 'mandolin', 'guitar', 'banjo', 'double bass', 'moderate tempo', 'romantic mood']
caption: This bluegrass song starts off with a male voice making an announcement. The music starts to play. The banjo plays an introductory bluegrass lick. This is accompanied by an acoustic guitar strumming chords. The double bass plays the root note and the fifth of the chord. The mandolin plays the rhythm section in the song. There is no vocal melody in this song. There is no percussion in this song. This song can be played in a movie with a Western theme.
